ConceptMapAbsenceIpsToSct (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ConceptMap/absence-to-snomed-uv-ips)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/CodeSystem/absent-unknown-uv-ips to http://snomed.info/sct
